entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
